appetizers.name: Caprese Skewers
appetizers.description: Caprese Skewers are fresh, colorful, and tangy cheese skewers perfect for the summer!

appetizers.name: Bacon Wrapped Brussels Sprouts
appetizers.description: Crisp bacon wrapped around tender brussels sprouts, and a maple glaze slathered on top, these are delicious!

coldSandwiches.name: Muffuletta
coldSandwiches.description: The classic New Orleans sandwich combines a homemade olive salad with layers of thin-sliced Italian cold cuts

coldSandwiches.name: Turkey Guacamole Wraps
coldSandwiches.description: Tuck smoked turkey and a creamy avocado spread into tortilla wraps and add a dash of hot sauce for a little heat.

hotSandwiches.name: Mac & Cheese Pork Sliders
hotSandwiches.description: These sliders bring a cookeout feel with its sweet and savory flavor and a kick from the homemade barbecue sauce

hotSandwiches.name: Cuban
hotSandwiches.description: The mighty Cubano is a pressed sandwich with a combination of roast pork and ham, topped with cheese and all the necessary fixings

desserts.name: Rice Krispie Treats
desserts.description: Classic treat that combines cereal and marshmallows to make something sweet, sticky, and delicious

desserts.name: Oatmeal Cookies
desserts.description: Soft chewy and delicious delicous oatmeal cookies
